species.name: kadabra
descriptions: A theory exists that this Pokémon was a young boy who couldn’t control his psychic powers and ended up transformed into this Pokémon.
If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.
If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.
It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close.
It happened one morning - a boy with extrasensory powers awoke in bed transformed into KADABRA.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

abilities.name: magic-guard
abilities.effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.
